message.raw: BLACS now doesn't crash if it gets an empty connection table for an experiment (only using this for testing), and BLACS now converts filepaths to the local format, that is, replaces Z: with the local shared drive prefix, and replaces slashes with the kind of slashes appropriate for the platform.
message.html: BLACS now doesn't crash if it gets an empty connection table for an experiment (only using this for testing), and BLACS now converts filepaths to the local format, that is, replaces Z: with the local shared drive prefix, and replaces slashes with the kind of slashes appropriate for the platform.

message: BLACS now doesn't crash if it gets an empty connection table for an experiment (only using this for testing), and BLACS now converts filepaths to the local format, that is, replaces Z: with the local shared drive prefix, and replaces slashes with the kind of slashes appropriate for the platform.
